runs.comm: Sanga stands up. No slips in place. short and wide and Baz cuts hard but Mahela makes a tumbling stop at cover point
length delivery on the middle and off, McCullum is in trouble, pushes inside the line and gets an edge down to third man
outside off stump, from a length, steered to third man for a single
slow off cutter, short in length, McCullum hops and waits for it to arrive and gently pushes to the off side
on the middle and leg line, turned towards midwicket
slides towards the pad and goes down the leg side
length delivery on the middle and off line, worked to midwicket

Wicket first ball! Trapped in front. It cut in from the off stump line to hit him on the kneel roll in front off middle and leg. It would have crashed into the stumps. The height was ok and so was the line.
leans forward to defend to the off side
gets forward to push it to left of backward point where Dilshan makes a diving stop
another one that cuts back in and McCullum gets forward , bat and pad close together, and defends

Clatter! McCullum was expecting another off cutter but was in for a shock. Death rattle! It landed on a length around the off stump and McCullum shaped to play for the incoming ball. Mistake! The ball held its line to knock out the off stump!
Whoa! Another one for Kulasekara! Three in this over. What a start. This one cuts back in and it moved past the feeble defensive poke to hit him in front of middle and leg
Four overthrows! It was punched to point where Dilshan fields and fires the throw at the non-striker's end. The throw misses the stumps and Malinga fails to back-up cleanly
leans forward to squeeze it to the off side

Dead duck! Right in front! As Fred Trueman would have said, "what is going off out there?! " It was full and it shaped in late. Taylor had pressed the front leg too far across and had to try playing around the front pad. Too late. The ball thuds into the pad. GOne!
oooh ... almost another wicket. This one was just outside off stump and the batsman is beaten all hands up .. this one held its line outside off
leans forward to squeeze this ball past backward point
slants away from the lefty and Sanga collects
Almost the hat-trick. But the inside-edge denies him there. It cut in and the batsman pokes it back on to the pad
leans forward to push the length delivery to the on side
length delivery outside the off stump and Hopkins lunges forward to waft at the ball .. And he is beaten comprehensively
this one holds its line outside off and he is beaten again
on the off and middle line, keeps a touch low, pushed back to the bowler
slants across away from Dan who shoulders arms
cuts away from the off stump line, Vettori tries to cut but is beaten
cuts in from outside leg stump, clipped away to deep square-leg
angling away from Dan who cuts it down to third man for couple of runs
Hopkins is run out Wicket no 5. It was a slow cutter, cut away to point region .. Kapugedera fires the throw to Sanga who breaks the stumps. Hopkins tried to dive in but is too late.
short in length outside off stump, punched away to deep backward point
length delivery outside off stump, squeezed away to third man
outside the off stump line, cut down to third man
gets forward to defend to the off side
cuts in to the middle and off line, steered to backward point
cuts in to the middle stump line, pushes towards mid-on for a quick single
First boundary. Whoa! First shot of intent. He leans forward to hit the length delivery through the line and past the non striker
gets forward to on drive for a single
gets forward to shovel it over wide mid-on region. He reached across and almost swatted it across
turns this through the on side
stops a touch on the batsman who pushes it wide of mid-on
gets forward to work this to midwicket
slower one, full in length, chipped slightly wide of Mendis at mid-on
dabbed towards Dilshan at backward point for a quick single .. Dilshan had a shy at the non-striker's end but misses/. Vettori was home any way
banged in short, at the body, swatted behind square-leg
worked behind square-leg again for a single this time
shuffles to the off side ...  and flicks a full delivery from outside off to deep square-leg
gets an inside edge on this one .. and will collect a single
from round the stumps, cuts in and goes down leg
shifts the line to the off stump and Dan late cuts it past short third man
slower, tossed well outside off stump, Dan goes for the sweep and misses it
stays back to punch it down to long-on
beaten comprehensively. The carrom ball .. cuts away from the clueless Nathan
goes back to clip it to the on side
goes right back and across to work it to square-leg
The reverse sweep! Dan fetches it from the middle and off line and slams it past short third man
plays the conventional sweep this time and will get a single
gets forward to on drive to long-on for a single
Wah! Another reverse sweep! This time was on the off stump line and Dan waits, watches the ball very closely and sweeps it very fine.
gets this one down to Malinga at deep square-leg region
leans forward to deflect it to the on side
gets on the front foot to deflect it for a single
moves forward to clip through the on side
steers this one through point

Big wicket. Dan is gone. It was tossed outside off and Vettori lunged across to play the slog-sweep. The ball goes very close to  the toe end of the bat and Sanga takes it. Vettori seems unhappy; he suggests that the bat hit the ground
gets forward to defend to the off side
in the zone outside off, tries to cut and is beaten
full in length on the off stump line, eased to long-off
on a length on the middle stump line, dabbed to point region
leans forward to defend the length delivery to the off side
on the off stump line, eased down to Malinga at long-off
turns in to the middle stump line, driven down to Malinga
tries to poke it away across the line and gets a thin inside edge on to the pad
gets forward to push it back to the bowler
on the off stump line, off driven to right of Malinga at long-off
gets to the front foot and drives it to long-off
fullish, on the middle, tapped to the on side
banged in short .. Nathan is too early through his pull shot and the slow bouncer sees the ball gently go past the bat
banged in short again, pulled away to deep backward square-leg
slower one around off stump, dragged towards square-leg

chance of run out but Malinga couldn't pick the ball. It was pushed towards short mid-on region .. Malinga rushed towards it and tried to pick but it kept slipping from him. The non-striker had rushed out too far across and had to get back in a hurry
It landed on a length and stopped a touch on Oram who was squared-up and tried to check his shot. He got a leading edge and the simple catch was taken at short cover
googly from outside off, punched through point
full delivery around off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
Googly does the trick. It broke back in from outside off and Mills was trying to play the sweep shot. He missed it completely and was struck perhaps just outside the line of the off stump.
Slip in place. Yet another googly, squeezed to the on side
on the off stump line, tapped close on the off side for a single
around the off stump line, skids away, pushed through point
fullish, around the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
outside the off stump line, dabbed to third man
short and slightly wide outside off stump and it was cut hard to left of backward point where Dilshan jumps and it brushes his fingers en route to the boundary
leans forward to punch it down to long-on
short in length, tries to swat it across the line and misses it completely. The ball goes over the middle stump and crashes against Sanga's  stomach. Ouch!
around the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
pushed to the covers
just outside off stump, steered to point for a single
gets forward to punch it down to long-on
gets well forward to defend to the off side
slow googly on the middle stump, punched down to Malinga at long-on
The googly slides past the bat and hits the pad. It was going down leg side
the bouncer around off stump, pulled away to deep square-leg region where Kulasekara stops and releases the throw quickly
The off stump has gone for a jog in Florida. Full and straight and that does the trick. It was a full in length on the off stump and the batsman tries to play across the line. Huge mistake. Gone!
Oh Malinga you beauty! The off stump has gone for a sprint this time. It flies to the on side. Again, full and straight and it was enough to slide under the bat and take out the off side
